entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being confined to his room for four days in a bad mood, indicating that he is a person who has been experiencing difficulties.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig's cage needs cleaning out and is starting to smell, suggesting that Hedwig is an animal that requires care and attention.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is described as looking critically at her reflection in the mirror on the inside of Harry's wardrobe door, indicating that she is a person who is concerned with her appearance.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, as indicated by the fact that he has a cage for her and is responsible for cleaning it.
Tonks visited Harry's room, as she followed him back into the hall and up the stairs.
